'''Explosive''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==

*{{BlockLink|TNT}}, an explosive block.
*{{EntityLink|Minecart with TNT}}, an entity that is primarily detonated by activator rails.
*{{EntityLink|End Crystal}}, an entity that explodes when hit.
*{{BlockLink|Red Bed|Bed}}, explodes in the Nether and the End.
*{{BlockLink|Respawn Anchor}}, explodes in the Overworld and the End if powered by glowstone.
*{{itemLink|Firework Rocket}}, bursts in midair.
*{{BlockLink|Etho Slab}}, a joke block that spawns anvils when exploding.
*{{EntityLink|Creeper}}, a mob that explodes if the player get too close.

== ''Education Edition'' ==
*{{BlockLink|Underwater TNT}}, explodes even underwater.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
*{{DuItemLink|TNT}}, a consumable that deals heavy damage to enemies (and allies).
*{{DuItemLink|Exploding Crossbow}}, fires explosive arrows.
*{{DuItemLink|Fireworks Arrow}}, combines the range of arrows with the explosion of TNT.
*{{DuEntityLink|Creeper}}, a hostile mob that runs towards the player to explode.
*{{DuEntityLink|Icy Creeper}}, a frosty Creeper variant found in the [[MCD:Creeping Winter|Creeping Winter]] DLC.
